page.title: 08CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: I am 11 years old and I have made a collection of the games played in our school playground. Not all of these games are played at the same time - there are 'seasons' for most of them. A lot of the games are based on T.V. programmes but some are very old. Line touch; hide and seek; touch; skipping; marbles; hopscotch; Jacob's ladder; heads down, thumb's up; polo; nuts and bolts, bulldog- one person is 'on it' and that person says BULLDOG. The other people run across the playground and if one is caught that person is 'on it'; Coca Cola release; sticky glue - one person is 'on it', the others hold on to their fingers until they say STICKY GLUE as part of the story that is told. Everyone runs away and if they are touched stand with legs apart to be released by a player going through; 40,40;dead lions
